name: Crossbow Crawler
description:
This is the demo for my next main project Crossbow Crawler! 

WASD - Player Movement

E - Interact/Pickup

R - Reload

Mouse Left - Shoot

TAB - Pause

ESC in any Menu - Exit Game

Crossbow Crawler is a top-down dungeon crawler where the combat revolves around the players crossbow. In this early version, you explore a small dungeon and see all of the base mechanics I was able  to implement.

 Please give feedback if anything is wrong/broken, or tell me what you did and didn't like as it could shape the games future. If you have the time, of course.

Thank you so much Lost Angel for helping me with the Music and a moderate amount of the art. I Wouldn't have been able to do it without your generosity.
